abbreviation for including: used to say that something such as a price includes an amount or item: Return fares from Heathrow to Belfast start from £68.90, incl tax. The device is available from Razer UK at £37.95 incl. battery.
abbreviation for inclusive: used to say that a price includes everything: Core system $180, all incl.
